org.objectstyle.cayenne.access
Interface DataContextFactory

public interface DataContextFactory

An interface for creating DataContexts.

Since:
1.2
Author:
Mike Kienenberger

Method Summary
 DataContext createDataContext(DataChannel parent, ObjectStore objectStore)
          Creates a DataContext with parent QueryEngine and a DataRowStore that should be used by the ObjectStore.
 

Method Detail

createDataContext

DataContext createDataContext(DataChannel parent,
                              ObjectStore objectStore)
Creates a DataContext with parent QueryEngine and a DataRowStore that should be used by the ObjectStore.

Parameters:
parent - parent QueryEngine used to communicate with the data source.
objectStore - ObjectStore used by DataContext.

1.2
